snippet: James Thompson, who was severely autistic, weighed 70 pounds when he died under the care of his niece, Naisia Norman, the Bronx district attorney’s office charged.
abstract: Bronx woman Naisia Norman pleads not guilty to charges of manslaughter and criminally negligent homicide in death of her severely autistic and cognitively disabled uncle James Thompson; authorities say she spent less than 10 percent of Thompson's Social Security benefits on his needs while acting as his caretaker.
lead_paragraph: James Thompson, who was severely autistic, weighed 70 pounds when he died under the care of his niece, Naisia Norman, the Bronx district attorney’s office charged.

headline.main: Bronx Woman Held in the Death of Her Uncle
headline.print_headline: Woman Held in the Death of Her Uncle
